sub_title: English to Dutch Translator | EN-NL | Native Dutch |
summary:
Hardworking & Reliable Native Dutch Translator For Top English To Dutch Translations
 
www.ermangultop.com

⭐TOP RATED TRANSLATOR ⭐
 
Hi my name is Erman and I'm a native Dutch speaker, born in Amsterdam with more than 5+ years of professional translation experience.
 
Here are a few highlights of what I can help you with and my skills:
 
✅  Website Translations, E-commerce Content, Marketing Materials, Software Localization, App Localization, Technical Translations, Transcriptions, Video or Multimedia Translations from English to Dutch, Subtitling, Subtitle translations, Survey Translations
 
✅  I can translate your files in any file format from English to Dutch; from websites to Word/Excel-documents including programming languages like XML & HTML
 
✅  Top-tier translations from English to Dutch
 
✅  Work done on time, every time!
 
I have worked with a variety of different website platforms, software products and mobile apps across several different industries.

As a subtitle translator, I have worked on 30+ (sports) documentaries, movies, series and TV-shows.
 
Don’t just take my word for the quality of my work. Here’s what one of my clients had to say after working together:
 
⭐"Erman is the perfect translator to work with. The deadline was extremely tight and he still managed to meet the deadline. The quality of his translation was good too. Furthermore, he was also very nice to work with, very kind. Can't think of a better translator!"⭐ 
 
- Ursina Sanderink (Owner), Sanderink & Co
 
🌟 WHY CHOOSE ME OVER OTHER FREELANCERS? 🌟
 
✅ 100% Availability:
Most freelancers are working on Upwork in addition to their regular job. I work fulltime on Upwork and am available fulltime for my clients!
 
✅ Client Reviews:
I love bringing massive value to all of my clients and earning their trust. All of my client reviews and feedback on my profile are important to me. I consider a project as finished only when the client is 100% happy!
 
✅ Responsiveness :
Communication and transparency are key when working together on a project. You can always directly reach me and I’ll be as transparent as possible with you about my work.

✅ Respect:
I treat everyone with respect, bring it to all situations, and appreciate the same in return.
 
I am eager to work with you to provide reliable, consistent and quality solutions to your translation projects!
 
Please contact me to discuss your project. Thanks!
 
-- Erman Gultop
 
⭐"Best translator we have hired on the platform so far!"⭐ - Johan van Zutphen (CEO), Qbis

treasury_media.title: www.ermangultop.com
treasury_media.description: Learn more about me and my services on my personal website: www.ermangultop.com

treasury_media.title: Portfolio
treasury_media.description: See my latest projects in my personal portfolio!

treasury_media.title: App Localization - English to Dutch - Plant Identification App
treasury_media.description:
The client wanted to have their English content translated to Dutch. They have an app, named PictureThis, where they provide information about flowers and trees to users. The users can search specific flowers/trees and read all information about it in the PictureThis-app. I had to translate this content.

Because some plants are toxic, I also had to describe medical procedures for humans/animals.

I translated every week 7.000 words.

- App Translation
- Localization
- English to Dutch

treasury_media.title: App Translation - English to Dutch - App Development
treasury_media.description:
The client has a mobile app where the user can stream songs, create playlists, browse through music and play their media.
The content is currently written in English. The client asked me to translate this to the Dutch language. I had to translate UI-content, functions, buttons and error messages. Also FAQ was inluded.

The content had a total of 1000 words

treasury_media.title: Product Campaigns in HTML | English to Dutch | Cryptocurrency
treasury_media.description:
The client rolled out campaigns for their cryptocurrency, and needed someone to translate this content from the English language to the Dutch language.

The client provided me file, and I had to use my technical skills as a QA to translate the content opened in Developementsoftware (Microsoft Visual Studio Code). The translation was executed in HTML

treasury_media.title: Amazon Listings - English to Dutch - Cosmetics
treasury_media.description:
The client wrote products and product information (Amazon) in English. The client listed cosmetics (eye liner, eye pencil, etc). The client wanted to have these product listings translated in Dutch. There was a total of 10.000 words.

- Product Translation
- English to Dutch Translation

treasury_media.title: Product Information | English to Dutch | Clothing
treasury_media.description:
The client wanted to have their English product listings translated to Dutch. The client created listings with product information about clothes. I translated these product listings from English to Dutch.

The total amount of words was 15.000.

- Product Information
- Product Listings
- English to Dutch

treasury_media.title: App Localization - English to Dutch - Note App
treasury_media.description:
The client wanted to have their English content translated to Dutch. They have an app, named Minimal, where the user is able to write notes. I translated all screens, functionalities and content.

- App Translation
- Localization
- English to Dutch

treasury_media.title: Client Feedback | App Localization | English to Dutch
treasury_media.description:
The client wanted to have the English app-content translated into the Dutch language.

Total Words 44,550

https://insighttimer.com/

treasury_media.title: Client Feedback | Web Testing | Avrio Agent
treasury_media.description:
The client is developing forms regarding insurances.

The testing included:
- To check if the text, number, email validations, date picker, etc on the forms work correctly
- Check if all questions are shown correctly for each form
- Validate questions display based on correct Logic; Radio buttons, checkboxes, etc
- Control the generated PDF's based on the forms

I needed to check these on the browsers IE, Safari, Mozilla and Chrome.

projects.title: Localize/Translate iOS apps from English to Dutch
projects.description:
There will be a set of 3 files and a spreadsheet to translate:

- all strings displayed in the app (140 words and short sentences)
- email and text message sent to participants
- App Store metadata such as name, subtitle, description, keywords and screenshot titles.

Successful work will certainly open a position to a long time job as we have a few other iPhone apps to translate and working on other projects for the future.

projects.title: Browser Testing / Functional Testing / Regression Testing / HGC
projects.description:
Testers will be entering & testing data to a Forms Website.

Testing includes:
Test formats are accurate: text, number, email validations
Validate questions display based on correct Logic; Radio buttons, checkboxes, etc

Need to know how to use browsers Chrome, Edge, Safari
Need to know how to use Google Sheets
Need to write test errors in the format outlined by our development team or Project manager.
Need to respond to UpWork messages within 48hrs

projects.title: Mobile App Testing | Web Testing | Aywa
projects.description:
The client had the need to have his newly developed Arabic movie stream website and mobile app completely tested and checked on UI/UX.
I have tested the entire website on different browsers on the systems Android, iOS, WIndows and MAC.

To have an overview of the last Testing results, the client received Test Reports. I have also added my personal improvements regarding UI/UX issues in these Test Reports.

Only potential clients can are allowed to view the added the Windows + MAC report, since I'm under NDA.

- Functional Testing
- Web Testing
- Mobile Testing
- Cross Browser Testing
- Device Testing
- UI/UX Testing
- Usability Testing

projects.title: Functional Testing | Web Testing | Wikimedia Foundation
projects.description:
Project description
The client asked me to access the Testing environment, and test the functionality to add, edit and remove an existing page on Wikimedia.
The client gave me a reproduction path and asked me to document the founded bugs in a Bug Report

I have added the Bug Report and the additional screenshots as attachments to this project.

-Functional Testing
-Web Testin

contributors.headline: English to Dutch Translator | EN-NL | Native Dutch |

projects.title: Functional Testing | Web Testing | Usability Testing | Secretbenefits
projects.description:
Secret Benefits had the need to get the functionalities tested on their website, targeting the end-to-end user.

This was my first project for Secret Benefits, and I decided to stick to the main functionalities of the website. I have created end-to-end tests.

After this test, I have tested the smaller functionalities of the website.

I made sure that at this stage in the development process, the main functionalities worked correctly by finding bugs, and re-checking the fixed bugs by the developers.

The client also asked me for improvements.

In this test, I added the bug report with the improvements and the additional screenshots.

- Software Testing
- Functional Testing
- Web Testing
- Usability Testing

profile_positions.description:
I am working as an English to Dutch translator. I translate and localize content (apps, websites, systems, product descriptions, documents, blogs, subtitling/subtitles, surveys and more).

Find out more about me and my services on my personal website www.ermangultop.com
profile_positions.title: English to Dutch Translator

profile_positions.description:
I have worked as a QA with a variety of websites, systems, software and mobile apps in an array of national and international industries from testing consultancies, digital agencies, news websites, SaaS, financial/marketing companies, media stream websites, dating websites, insurance companies, sports companies, (mobile) parking companies, and many more.

Whether your business is big or small; I can provide value to you!

✅ 5+ years experience as QA testing software, systems, websites & mobile apps
✅ Software Testing | Functional Testing | Web Testing | Usability Testing | Mobile Testing | App Testing | Cross-Browser Testing | UI/ UX Testing | Regression Testing | A/B Testing |
✅ 3+ years of experience in Automated Testing, using the tools Selenium, MS Visual Code, Cypress, Postman, and JMeter.
✅ Javascript | HTML | SQL | CSS | C# |
✅ 4+ years of experience in Agile Environments and working with tools like Slack, Skype,
JIRA, Trello, and Bugzilla.
✅ CSTE, ISTQB, SAFe, CAT & Agile-certified
✅ Part of T500 (Netherlands' most inspiring under 26s across all fields of Digital)

The majority of my projects as a QA were started completely from scratch.
Getting requirements from stakeholders, choosing the right tools, creating test cases, executing the test cases, and reporting the results of my tests are testing processes I love to execute.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Quality Assurance Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Mintlab is an organization which offers SaaS-services to governments and companies.
Mintlab is working in an Agile-environment.
-Investigate user stories
-Collaborate with Product Owner
-Collaborate with development(backend + frontend)
-Collaborate with Service Desk to identify bugs identified by customers -Set up testscenario’s
-Document testfindings, demonstrate to dev-team
-Setting up testfeatures (Automation)
-Automate tests (Cypress, Visual Studio Code)
-Mobile testing
-API testing (Postman)
